law.catch_line: Exemptions not applicable to claims for child support.
law.text: The exemptions provided in KRS 342.180 and KRS 427.010 to 427.040 shall not apply for executions, attachments, or garnishments, issued for the collection of maintenance of minor children.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 330, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 297, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 5(g).
